definitions.definition: An inhabitant of the city of Babylon.
An inhabitant of Babylonia, which included Chaldea ; a Chaldean .
An astrologer ; so called because the Chaldeans were remarkable for the study of astrology .

main_definition: An inhabitant of the city of Babylon.
secondary_definitions: An inhabitant of Babylonia, which included Chaldea ; a Chaldean .
An astrologer ; so called because the Chaldeans were remarkable for the study of astrology .

definitions.definition: A later form of Akkadian language spoken in Babylonia in 1950 BC – 100 AD.

main_definition: A later form of Akkadian language spoken in Babylonia in 1950 BC – 100 AD.
